title: Help
body:
Survey Instructions

This survey will include a list of questions.
  • For each of the questions, please pick the answer that best describes your current situation.
  • To select a response, click directly on the word.
  • Note that your answer choices can change.
  • Be aware you cannot go back to a previous question in the survey. The back button on your browser will not work.
Some questions are very similar and are meant to be that way. Please answer all questions. This survey, on average, will take about 15-30 minutes to complete.
